com.ssdd.util.constants

Interface INtpConstants


  • public interface INtpConstants
    Stores the constant values for the NTP algorithm.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_FAILED_ATTEMPTS
      Maximum failed attempts for the time sample request process (/ntp/time) in the NTP service.
      static long MAX_SLEEP_MS
      Maximum time (in milliseconds) between time samples in NTP service.
      static long MIN_SLEEP_MS
      Minimum time (in milliseconds) between time samples in NTP service.
      static int NUM_SAMPLES
      Number of iterations of sampling time in the client and server on NTP algorithm.
      static boolean SLEEP_BETWEEN_SAMPLES
      If set to true in the NTP service it waits a random time interval between samples, else the two time samples are taken consecutively.

    • Field Detail

      • NUM_SAMPLES

        static final int NUM_SAMPLES
        Number of iterations of sampling time in the client and server on NTP algorithm.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_SLEEP_MS

        static final long MIN_SLEEP_MS
        Minimum time (in milliseconds) between time samples in NTP service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_SLEEP_MS

        static final long MAX_SLEEP_MS
        Maximum time (in milliseconds) between time samples in NTP service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SLEEP_BETWEEN_SAMPLES

        static final boolean SLEEP_BETWEEN_SAMPLES
        If set to true in the NTP service it waits a random time interval between samples, else the two time samples are taken consecutively.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_FAILED_ATTEMPTS

        static final int MAX_FAILED_ATTEMPTS
        Maximum failed attempts for the time sample request process (/ntp/time) in the NTP service.
